author: Blade
title: Indianise Your Keys
review:
Acquired this as a trade when I was younger for helping a mate and im so glad I did. I cant see why alot of members don't like these I think they are great, one of the few LEGO items, outside the bricks themselves, I like.

This particular one is of the Indian Chief. His hands, arms legs and head move but he doesn't come apart, well his hands do but they dont count, which is a good thing as part of a key ring you wouldn't want to loose a piece, I know that would annoy me.

Overall it's a great little thing to collect or use and if you are able to acquire one I feel you should, 6/10 or above average from me.
